title: Disable firefox browser screenshot notifications over version 114.0.1 2023?
content:
Hello there,

I use the "take screenshot" feature a lot so it is not very practical receiving the screenshot image notification.

Maybe one option to disable/enable makes sense.

Thank you
creator: morpheus.ziplon

title: Some website display the letters "fi" as "Y".  This seems to be a problem in translating the ASCII code to English text.
content:
Some websites display the letters "fi" as "Y". This seems to be a problem in translating the ASCII code to English text. This doesn't happen on all websites but Wikipedia seems to be the main culprit.

Any suggestions how I can fix it?

Incidentally, this only happens on my MacBook; not on my desktop Mac. And both are using the latest version of Firefox.
creator: eddleetham

title: Issue with embedded hyperlinks in a 'secure' website.
content:
I'm using Firefox on my Mac, and I'm really pleased with it so far, but I have a small issue on a specific website.

I can't share the website with you because it's behind the login details of my pension provider, sorry, but essentially the problem is with the hyperlinks to my monthly pension slips. When I click them, nothing happens, that I'm aware of, at least.

If I login to the same website using Safari (it's the only other browser installed), clicking on the link opens a preview of the PDF document on the open webpage (it doesn't open a new tab or window), but it's this that doesn't seem to be working in Firefox. However, if I click on the link and then the Download PDF link, the correct document downloads as expected, just no preview.

Is there a Firefox setting that could help with this, or is it more a compatibility issue in the website's design?

Thank you.
creator: Nightowl999

title: l'app non funziona !
content: Buongiorno, il programma si è bloccato. Il cursore rimane con la clessidra fissa e non riesco più a cliccare posta in arrivo, mentre la cartelle posta inviata è consultabile come le altre cartelle d'archivio. La mia versione attualmente in uso è: 102.12.0 (64 bit). Potete aiutarmi ? GRazie !
creator: giovanni.audasso

title: I can nolonger log into my bank ... National Australia Bank
content:
Hi

I log into my bank (in Australia) NAB almost every day. For about several weeks now when I successfully log in to the site it says "Service Temporarily Unavailable. Please try Later". However, if I use Chrome and log in (immediately after trying it wit Firefox) it logs in every time.

Can you please help me understand what might be stopping me from using Firefox on NAB website?
creator: bnjelfs

title: URGENT HELP LOCKED OUT OF ACCOUNT HELP ME
content: I have literally been crying for what seems like the past hour because I have been locked out of my actual firefox account. I didn't know how to make a "recovery key" before, and I never realized that forgetting this password would literally lock me out of all of my log-ins. Is there any phone number I can call? I need urgent help. I've been trying to guess my password by using stupid passwords I always tend to use, and that isn't working as I keep getting locked out. Can I get in touch with a developer or staff member who can please help me? Help me please this is the only thing I have been able to find I am so confused and scared help me please I am locked out of my account.
creator: lipop888

title: Unable to scroll when hovering over a folder in bookmark side panel
content: I just switched from chrome to Firefox. I find that when I hover my mouse over a folder in the bookmark side panel, I can't scroll with the mouse scroll wheel. This is really inconvenient since I have a lot of folders in my bookmark and hovering over the arrow to scroll is a pain.
creator: vagente

title: 1Password not showing in toolbar
content: I can't find a setting in Firefox or 1Password that will allow the 1Password to display in Firefox toolbar. Help please.
creator: dremltr

title: Ticketmaster resistance..see message below..
content:
I've tried to purchase tickets and the web sites direct me to Ticketmaster. When I get to Ticketmaster I get the message below:


Pardon the Interruption As you were browsing something about your browser made us think you were a bot. There are a few reasons this might happen: 

   You're a power user moving through this website with super-human speed.    You've disabled JavaScript in your web browser    A third-party browser plugin, such as Ghostery or NoScript is preventing JavaScript from running.
creator: warrenarch

title: Unexpected Refresh after Midnight
content: Every night I happen to be browsing past midnight, my active tab refreshes without any user input. Is there any way I can figure out why this is happening? No other program is affected as far as I can tell.
creator: Prejudice182
